name: South (Hiraeth Games)
description:
It's the end of the world! And you're just farmer. The old ones have awakened from their slumber and their madness is trampling your crops. You must fight them off and survive.

Credits:

Voice Actors:

Farmer Joe: Lemon Pokle.

News Caster: Lemon Pokle .

Monster Noises: That Weirdo named Bucket

Whispers: Orion Welti,  Alorah.

Everything Else:

Orion Welti.
